channel.title: How To Add NPCs and make them drop items
channel.description: Ok on my source there is a command ::3rdage, it teles u to an area but there are no NPCs arounnd or anything so i was just wondering how i can add NPCs and make them drop 3rd age

item.title: How To Add NPCs and make them drop items
item.dc:creator: @veikron veikron
item.description:
@veikron wrote:

na lol that wont work im guessing your using an allstar source… go to autospawn.cfg…(pile of books right click it open with notepad)

you wil se a list looking thing similiar to this

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption ////////Jad Mini Game spawn = 2630 2406 5084 0 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Tz kek spawn = 2597 2400 5080 4 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Tzhaar mej spawn = 2740 2403 5085 8 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Tzhaar xil spawn = 2591 2403 5085 12 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Ket-Zek spawn = 2598 2403 5085 16 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Ket-Zek spawn = 2610 2403 5085 20 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Ket-Zek spawn = 2627 2403 5085 24 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Ket-Zek spawn = 2631 2403 5085 28 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Yt-Mejkot spawn = 2605 2403 5088 32 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Yt-Mejkot spawn = 2745 2403 5090 36 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Tzok Jad ////////End Of Tzhaar spawn = 12 2596 3157 0 0 0 0 0 1 barb spawn = 17 2591 3158 0 0 0 0 0 1 barb

now press enter on last one and add something like this

spawn = 912 3098 3938 0 0 0 0 0 1 Battlemage this might now show up well in code idk but this means
*spawn = 912 a battlemage npc id 912 will spawn

  • 2591 3158 the cordinates of were it will spawn change it to in the ::3rdaged
  • the 0s are sayign it doesnt move
  • i forget wat the 1 means lol
  • and the // stuff “battlemage” is just to help you remember what it is it doesnt need to be there

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 06, 2008, 09:01:53 pm[/size][hr]ok when its number likes 1234[]5678 imagine that box thing as like 5 spaces or a tab thats what autospawn looks like not all crunched together like that

Read full topic
